thread.title: Who Are Anime's Top Ten Sharpest Dressed Men?
thread.title_full: Who Are Anime's Top Ten Sharpest Dressed Men?

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: Who Are Anime's Top Ten Sharpest Dressed Men?
text:
Outfits are everything in anime -- whether it's fluorescent jackets, magical uniforms, or just the right pair of underwear. But who are the sharpest-dressed men of anime? Goo Ranking asked Japanese fans to rank anime men by dress sense. And here are the top ten results:
 
10. Yoshikage Kira, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure 



9. Kosaku Shima, Kacho Kosaku Shima 



7. Kogoro Akechi, Trickster  (tied) 



7. Tuxedo Mask, Sailor Moon  (tied) 



6. Duke Togo, Golgo 13 



5. Sebastian Michaelis, Black Butler 



4. Kaito Kuroba, Detective Conan 



3. Lupin III, Lupin III 



2. Sanji, One Piece 

 
And anime's sharpest-dressed man, according to the fans:
 
1. Daisuke Jigen, Lupin III 



So what do you think? Does Jigen deserve to outrank his buddy? Should Tuxedo Mask have been higher up? Or is there someone you think the fans forgot? Let us know in the comments!
 
Source: Otaku USA Magazine 
 

 
Kara Dennison is responsible for  multiple webcomics , blogs and runs interviews for  (Re)Generation Who  and  PotterVerse , and is half the creative team behind the OEL light novel series  Owl's Flower . She blogs at  karadennison.com  and tweets  @RubyCosmos .
